text: If the sharks were men, they would fight each other to conquer foreign boxes and prey. In addition, each shark would force its own prey to fight in those battles. Each fish would teach its prey that there is a huge difference between them and the prey of other fish. They would proclaim that, although all the frogs are changed - as everyone knows - the truth is that they speak in very different languages and therefore never manage to understand each other. Each sailor who, in the war, kills a few enemy sailor -of those who speak another language- would be awarded a medal of seashells and would be awarded the title of hero. FIN
title: Si los tiburones fueran hombres III
author: Bertolt Brecht
